name: Colin
text: Howdy! I’m Colin, AKA The Reaper of Ravenglass. Oops, sorry! Elsie said you don’t like loud noises...

name: Colin
text: So Elsie said you’d have a mission for me?...

name: Colin
text: Uh… You just want samples? I see. So no epic quest then? *sigh*...

name: Colin
text: Elsie said I’d work for free? She does keep saying I need the exposure…
